metadata.name: The Safari Academy Collection #1
metadata.description: The Students from the Safari Academy have the main goal of making the world a better place, one NFT at a time. Combining charity, a DAO nature, Metaverse integration, P2E games and passive income in one of a kind project!Featuring a holder's roadmap, they will buy land in The Metaverse and let holders decide what will be built upon it, reimburse all the fees from the secondary market sales back to the holders through their own token, develop a P2E game, the Safari Academy adds more than 40 ETH to the community wallet in order to support future projects of our holders, voted by the community.Besides all of this, they are also giving away more than $150.000 in ETH, NFTs and other prizes!
